title: Ticket #5232: Brain Dump for Bill Taylor
description:
This ticket lists the flight-worthy responsibilities for Bill Taylor and who will assume them once he is gone. For each item, Bill needs to make sure the new team member has received a complete brain-dump - upon brain dump being complete, please mark each item as 'Done'.

Responsibilities

  1. HTCondor regression tests (TJ) done
  2. HTCondor regression test framework (TJ and AlanD) done
  3. Rust Schedule (Zach) done
  4. Email Lists (Tim and ToddT) done
  5. Key lock box (TJ) done
  6. Office phones and room assignments and name plates(TJ) done
  7. on floor master key holder (TJ)
  8. one of those making CHTC and CONDOR wiki accounts (ToddT)
  9. Newly hired CHTC staff/student checklist (Wiki)
  10. Departing CHTC staff/student checklist (Wiki)
